glsa.title: FreeRADIUS: Root privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities were discovered in Gentoo's systemd unit for FreeRADIUS which could lead to root privilege escalation.

background.p: FreeRADIUS is a modular, high performance free RADIUS suite.

description.p: It was discovered that Gentooâ€™s FreeRADIUS systemd unit set permissions on an unsafe directory on start.

impact.p: A local attacker could escalate privileges.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
